it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller

Interface Controller

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Remote, RemoteObserver<ViewEvent>, Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControllerImpl

    public interface Controller
extends RemoteObserver<ViewEvent>, Runnable
    Represents the Controller of the MVC pattern. It is responsible for running a single instance of the game, in particular:
    • Creating the match instance
    • Managing the player views, including disconnection and reconnection
    • Manage the Model
    • Listen for incoming events from the views
    • Shutting down the match
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Method Summary

      void disconnectRemoteView(String username)
      Disconnects the remote view of the player with given name.
      Model getModel()
      Retrieves the model associated to the controller
      boolean reconnectRemoteView(String username, RemoteView remote)
      Tries to reconnect the player with given username, if it has been detected that the player is disconnected
      void shutdown()
      Forces interruption of the running game

    • Method Detail

      • getModel

        Model getModel()
        Retrieves the model associated to the controller
        Returns:
        The object representing the model

      • disconnectRemoteView

        void disconnectRemoteView(String username)
        Disconnects the remote view of the player with given name.
        Parameters:
        username - username of the player, not null

      • reconnectRemoteView

        boolean reconnectRemoteView(String username,
                            RemoteView remote)
        Tries to reconnect the player with given username, if it has been detected that the player is disconnected
        Parameters:
        username - username of the player
        remote - remote view of the player
        Returns:
        true if the reconnection succeeded, false otherwise

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Forces interruption of the running game
